contexts.context: <mark>His</mark> part in F's prosperity. His envoy Aloysius Gylabertus...
His part in F's prosperity. <mark>His</mark> envoy Aloysius Gylabertus shall visit F.
Maximilian thanks F for <mark>his</mark> letter. He has happily learned from Gabriel von...
...F a successful hunting trip in the future. <mark>His</mark> health.
